API Collection# In-App Purchase App Store Review Screenshots

Create and commit App Store review screenshots for in-app purchases.## [Topics](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/in-app-purchase-app-store-review-screenshots#topics)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/in-app-purchase-app-store-review-screenshots#Endpoints)

[`Read In-App Purchase Review Screenshot Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-inapppurchaseappstorereviewscreenshots-_id_)Get information about a specific review screenshot for an in-app purchase.[`Create an In-App Purchase Review Screenshot`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-inapppurchaseappstorereviewscreenshots)Reserve a review screenshot for an in-app purchase.[`Commit a Review Screenshot for an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-inapppurchaseappstorereviewscreenshots-_id_)Commit an uploaded image asset as a review screenshot for an in-app purchase.[`Delete a Review Screenshot for an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-inapppurchaseappstorereviewscreenshots-_id_)Delete an image that you uploaded for review of an in-app purchase.### [Objects](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/in-app-purchase-app-store-review-screenshots#Objects)

[`object InAppPurchaseAppStoreReviewScreenshot`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/inapppurchaseappstorereviewscreenshot)[`object InAppPurchaseAppStoreReviewScreenshotCreateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/inapppurchaseappstorereviewscreenshotcreaterequest)[`object InAppPurchaseAppStoreReviewScreenshotResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/inapppurchaseappstorereviewscreenshotresponse)[`object InAppPurchaseAppStoreReviewScreenshotUpdateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/inapppurchaseappstorereviewscreenshotupdaterequest)## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/in-app-purchase-app-store-review-screenshots#see-also)

### [Submitting In-App Purchases for App Review](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/in-app-purchase-app-store-review-screenshots#Submitting-In-App-Purchases-for-App-Review)

[In-App Purchase Submissions](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/in-app-purchase-submissions)Create a review submission for an in-app purchase.
